name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 12, in Lianyungang, Jiangsu, a black car hit pedestrians and electric bikes, injuring many people at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police report stated that the incident was caused by improper operation of the driver, resulting in one person seriously injured, three people slightly injured and seven people with minor abrasions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, some parents in Huizhou went to the municipal government to protest against the Huizhou Education Bureau's poor supervision and Zhongkai No. 2 Middle School's failure to comply with the nine-year compulsory education.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of July 13, the Henan Nanyang Star Dream Animation Festival, which was originally scheduled to be held that day, was forcibly canceled and postponed by local police because it was close to the Two Sessions and there were minors wearing kimonos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 13th, the seventh anniversary of Liu Xiaobo's death

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 10, Dandong, Liaoning. A man went to the Dandong Yuanbao District Market Supervision Bureau to complain about something, but no one answered the phone. He drove to the Market Supervision Bureau and found that there were no staff handling business during working hours. All staff left their posts and ate in the cafeteria in advance.
On July 12, the official announcement: The inspection team was organized to conduct an inspection, and the accountability procedure has now begun.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 12, a robbery occurred in Xiaolin Town, Cixi, Zhejiang. A man rushed into a gold shop with a simulated toy gun, robbed it and fled.
The police reported: There were no casualties at the scene and the suspect has been arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 12, Yueyang, Hunan. Netizens posted a video saying that a fishery law enforcement vehicle got stuck in a mud pit and could not move. Law enforcement officers pushed the vehicle, and many people watched the excitement nearby, but no one came forward to help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 10, the Chinese Embassy in Japan issued a statement saying, "Our embassy immediately coordinated with the local police to conduct a full-scale search and rescue."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, Caixin.com reported: After extensive research, Caixin found that not only road freight, but also edible oil water transportation has mixed transportation chaos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In April this year, a British man named "Jackie" posted on a social media platform that he was working as a planner in a large Internet game company. He said that although he was very busy with the project recently and had to work overtime every day, he might still be replying to messages at 12 o'clock in the evening, but his life was very fulfilling and he liked his current job very much. Moreover, his income was higher than that in the UK.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 11, Beijing. Blogger "Xiangbei Budian" interviewed online taxi drivers about their views on Carrot Run. The driver said: This is a trend and it cannot stop the progress of the times. "When there are driverless cars on the road, there will be no traffic accidents." However, some people hold different views on this, worrying that after the popularization of driverless taxis, a large number of drivers will lose their jobs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, the data released by the People's Bank of China showed that in the first half of the year, my country's RMB deposits increased by 11.46 trillion yuan, of which household deposits increased by 9.27 trillion yuan. This triggered doubts and ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 13, the mother of a Chinese-Japanese girl who was injured in the Nantong bus accident said that her child is currently undergoing rehabilitation training.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 10, the Henan Provincial Department of Education issued an urgent notice to investigate the situation of overseas study tours for primary and secondary school students.
The notice stated that a comprehensive investigation should be conducted on the potential ideological risks of such activities that promote Western political systems and glorify Western civilization for primary and secondary school students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen signed "Shenyang Industrial People Who Can't Live" posted a message saying that he had been treated unfairly by the Shenyang Branch of Industrial Bank. In the article, the netizen said that he is a front-line employee of the Shenyang Branch of Industrial Bank. He joined the company at the age of 24 and has served Industrial Bank for 16 years. However, under the branch's strict and frequently changing assessment system, he was unable to bear the huge work pressure, and was later diagnosed with depression. In the second month of hospitalization, he was admitted to Industrial Bank

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 9, Harbin Institute of Technology issued a notice through counselors in the grade groups of each college, requiring teachers and students to obtain approval before participating in off-campus cultural activities, philosophy and social science activities, and activities organized by foreign embassies and consulates in China and overseas non-governmental organizations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10, Hebei. A Xiaomi SU7 owner posted a video saying that she picked up the car on the 4th, but the suspension system had problems just after driving it for more than 20 kilometers. Xiaomi has been shirking responsibility, and now she has sold the car without receiving any compensation. "It is actually very difficult for ordinary people to protect their rights," she said.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 12 (Released), Nantong, Jiangsu. Netizens posted a video saying that a delivery boy had been lying on his electric bike for more than half an hour. He did not respond when they called him. Later, kind people and 120 woke him up. The delivery boy said that he had been delivering food since the day before and had not eaten yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @FkUccpxjp Because the original file is in ofd format

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 13 (report) Shanxi. Mr. Liu told the media that this year he bought a set of children's history books called "Children's History Encyclopedia" at the "Shangshang Impression Children's Book Flagship Store". When he was reading it on July 8, he found that there were many obvious errors in it.
Among them, Puyi abdicated in 1912, while the book said it was 1921. Secondly, the time when Liu Xiu became emperor was mistakenly marked as "26 AD" and the fall of the Western Jin Dynasty was mistakenly marked as "311 AD"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 13, Motherland Magazine released a photo commemorating Jiang Zemin's visit to primary school students at the frontline of flood control in 1998.
Motherland Magazine is a state-owned institution approved and registered by the Central Organization and Establishment Commission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 12, Beijing. Victor, an international student, left his wallet in the basket of a shared bicycle. When he found it and looked for it, the shared bicycle had been ridden away. So he hurriedly asked for help from a patrolling police officer. The police contacted the shared bicycle company and found the contact number of the user. In less than an hour, the wallet was found. Many netizens left mocking comments in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 11, the new Chinese Ambassador to Cambodia Wang Wenbin inspected the "Xi Jinping Avenue" in Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 12, China Business News: Hong Kong's new home prices fell below 2015 levels, with residential transaction volume falling by 30% in June.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After posting, the photo has been deleted.
